column5: Anyone meet the new owners yet? We went over one day last week but didn,t find anyone around. We used to stay there before but moved to Gold Pines 7 years ago. Maybe looking at going back.

Unless Pat has sold the place in the last 3 weeks there is no new ownership at Evergreen Lodge in Ear Falls. You may be referring to Golden Eagle, I think that is the name of the camp just south of Evergreen. BTY Moose is back at Evergreen this year.
